Hive welcome information
Dear {!Case.First_Name__c} {!Case.Last_Name__c},
**Welcome to Hive!**
You are now a registered user - please click here to access Hive. We recommend using the Google Chrome browser.
If you have questions or feedback on Hive…
· Raise this with a Tiger Team member or Champion User via Chatter: To do this, click “Join” on the Hive Help and Support Chatter Group and write your feedback as a question, ensuring you tag a Tiger Team member in this using @username. They will then either respond or escalate this.
If you want to learn more about Hive…
· Join the HIVE New Joiner training session. If you would like to schedule a new joiner training session please screen our Agenda and sign up for the training here. Please indicate if any of the add-on modules in the agenda are relevant for your role. · Join a new release training session: You will receive invitations to training sessions every time there is a release. These may take the form of short VMRs or full classroom training depending on the size and complexity of the release · Watch the Hive videos: Training videos and materials for each release are on the Hive Help and Support Chatter Group. To access these, click to join the group, then navigate to “Files > View All” and sort by title to get a full view of all videos in the correct order · Ask a Tiger Team member or Champion User: Our dedicated groups of business representatives will be on hand to answer any questions you may have
To contact one of the Tiger Team members…
If you would like more information on Hive or have any questions, please reach out to the relevant Tiger Team member listed below:
· Leah Ladines, Salvador Castilla and Karina Lameirinhas – Marketing · Steven Moody and Sunita Bhagat – Sales Planning · Kevin Steward and Heiko Johannisson – Sales · Nigel Grange and Colin McCallion – GCX · Berengere Chaintreau-Fuchs – Seller Experience · John Leichty – Finance · For all other queries, please email Project Hive Support
We hope you enjoy using Hive!
Project Hive Team
